::Windrazor, taken aback, answers Vulois::
Windrazor: I was a great Decepticon leader, but before i rose to power i 
served with Soundwave i the great war.  I know this might not mean much to 
you, but Soundwave and I believed in honor.  We wanted honor in the Con 
ranks, but no one would listen.  That is why I gathered up some Decepticons, 
and made a elite group of honrable warriors.  All of them that is left, are 
what we are now calling the peace angels.  I retired from the war, and vowed 
never to get into one again.  But soon i got a damage report from the Neo 
Beast wars and saw that my old friend had been massacred by the Alliance.  
The only reason i came out of  retirement was to strive for peace.  I dont 
want to lose anymore friends.
::he hoped that Vulois beleived him::
